TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public NotInheritable Class InputManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: Manages all the input systems in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

span.span: Manages all the input systems in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會負責協調所有輸入中的系統[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。The class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 篩選條件是接聽的任何程式碼或。A filter is any code that listens to or . 篩選可以修改輸入的暫存區域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 監視器就會接聽任何程式碼或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 監視器無法修改輸入的暫存區域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 控制輸入的暫存區域。The controls the input staging area. 輸入的臨時區域處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件。The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events. 在處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]後續階段中：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 前置處理階段。Pre-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 預先通知階段。Pre-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的事件所引發。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知後階段。Post-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 後置處理階段。Post-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Current As InputManager
public: static property System::Windows::Input::InputManager ^ Current { System::Windows::Input::InputManager ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the associated with the current thread.

span.span: Gets the associated with the current thread.
The input manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別在網際網路區域中將無法使用。This class will not be available in Internet zone.

permission.span: 取得目前輸入的管理員。

span.span: for getting the current input manager.
Associated enumerations:

summary.span: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the method.

span.span: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件會與這個事件來回應輸入輸入的管理員功能表模式的控制項註冊的委派。Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager’s menu mode.

summary.span: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.

span.span: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsInMenuMode As Boolean
public: property bool IsInMenuMode { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this is in menu mode.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this is in menu mode.

value.span: 如果這個處於功能表模式; 否則。

span.span: if this is in menu mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`若任何功能表未開啟，而它會傳回`false`如果有任何功能表開啟。The property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.

summary.span: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the method.

span.span: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件會與此事件以回應離開輸入的管理員功能表模式的控制項註冊的委派。Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager’s menu mode.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MostRecentInputDevice As InputDevice
public: property System::Windows::Input::InputDevice ^ MostRecentInputDevice { System::Windows::Input::InputDevice ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value that represents the input device associated with the most recent input event.

span.span: Gets a value that represents the input device associated with the most recent input event.
The input device.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to leave.

summary.span: Called by components to leave menu mode.

span.span: Called by components to leave menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件會呼叫這個方法，以保留輸入的管理員功能表模式。A component calls this method to leave the input manager’s menu mode. `menuSite`釋出的特殊的存取權的視窗訊息。The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages. 呼叫這個方法會導致內部開啟功能表，以遞減的計數，並設定屬性`false`，如果這是要關閉的最後一個功能表。Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PostNotifyInput As NotifyInputEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after the handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events have been raised.

span.span: Occurs after the handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events have been raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 監視器就會接聽任何程式碼或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 監視器無法修改輸入的暫存區域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 處理常式附加至，讓使用者加入的處理常式叫用處理常式之前在系統中時以相反順序叫用。The handlers attached to are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system. 在處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]後續階段中：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 前置處理階段。Pre-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 預先通知階段。Pre-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的事件所引發。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知後階段。Post-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 後置處理階段。Post-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event.

[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的事件所引發。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知後階段。Post-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 後置處理階段。Post-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ProcessInput(class System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs input) cil managed
Public Function ProcessInput (input As InputEventArgs) As Boolean

span.span: The input to process.
Processes the specified input synchronously.

returns.span: if all input events were handled; otherwise, .

span.span: if all input events were handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 篩選條件是接聽的任何程式碼或。A filter is any code that listens to or . 篩選可以修改輸入的暫存區域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 監視器就會接聽任何程式碼或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 監視器無法修改輸入的暫存區域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 指定的輸入處理的所有篩選器和監視，最後會分派至適當的項目，做為輸入的事件。The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event. 在處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]後續階段中：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 前置處理階段。Pre-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 預先通知階段。Pre-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的事件所引發。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知後階段。Post-notify stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 後置處理階段。Post-process stage. 輸入的管理員引發事件。The input manager raises the event.

span.span: is .
for processing the specified input.
Associated enumerations:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PushMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to enter.

summary.span: Called by components to enter menu mode.

span.span: Called by components to enter menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件會呼叫此方法來進入輸入的管理員功能表模式。A component calls this method to enter the input manager’s menu mode. `menuSite`取得權限的存取權的視窗訊息。The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages. 呼叫這個方法會導致遞增的開啟功能表內部計數並設定屬性`true`，如果這是要開啟的第一個功能表。Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.

span.span: is .
